message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While I appreciate your offer, $12,000 is too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $16,000?
I'm willing to meet you at $14,000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
